subject: Re: Simsonn order enquiry #SSN1651
description_text:
I’ll go with the silver one Op 5 jun 2025 om 09:27 heeft SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> het volgende geschreven: ﻿
 
 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hi, we only have the silver Pro Plus-P3-H3 left in our German warehouse and not the black version. We can ship you the silver pedal from Germany. Or we will ship you the black Pro Plus-P3-H3 you bought from China. please let me know as soon as possible which option you want. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Matteo Deschamps,  Alright, we’ve notified the warehouse to process your silver pedal order.
